${ModID}:Clairvoyance.NAME: Clairvoyance
${ModID}:Clairvoyance.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL If this card is in your hand at the start of your turn, draw {!M!|1=a card|@=!M! cards}. It gains Retain until played. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GuidingLight.NAME: Guiding Light
${ModID}:GuidingLight.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. When drawn, Exhaust this, then draw cards until your hand is full.

${ModID}:Inevitability.NAME: Inevitability
${ModID}:Inevitability.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Retain. At the end of your turn, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and gain !B! Block. NL Increase these amounts by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:Propagation1.NAME: Propagation
${ModID}:Propagation1.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, add a #ySlimed to your hand. NL Duplicate your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Propagation2.NAME: Propagation
${ModID}:Propagation2.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, add a copy of a random card in your hand and of #yPropagation to your discard pile.

${ModID}:Propagation3.NAME: Propagation
${ModID}:Propagation3.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, shuffle a copy of this into your draw pile. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Propagation4.NAME: Propagation
${ModID}:Propagation4.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, shuffle a Propagation into your draw pile. NL Deal !D! damage for ALL of your cards named "Propagation" or "Slimed". NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Propagation5.NAME: Propagation
${ModID}:Propagation5.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play another card, shuffle a #ySlimed into your draw pile. NL Deal !D! damage for ALL of your cards named "Slimed".
